meanings.definition: Relating to an hour or hours.
meanings.sent1: The horal clock chimed every hour, marking the passage of time.
meanings.sent2: The horal study session lasted for several hours.
meanings.sent3: The horal dance class was a fun way to spend time learning new moves.
meanings.sent4: Her horal dedication to practice paid off when she won the competition.
meanings.sent5: The horal rhythm of the music kept everyone in sync during the performance.

meanings.sent1: The horal train service ensured timely transportation for commuters.
meanings.sent2: The horal reminders helped her stay on track with her tasks.
meanings.sent3: The horal snack breaks were a welcome pause during the busy workday.
meanings.sent4: His horal routine of stretching prevented muscle stiffness.
meanings.sent5: The horal updates kept the team informed about the project progress.
